meaningMnemonic: A <radical>clown</radical> takes a <radical>knife</radical> and <kanji>divide</kanji>s himself. First he divides himself into two pieces, then he's in four pieces, then... oh why won't he stop?!
readingMnemonic: The clown finally stops trying to <kanji>divide</kanji> himself, and you can't stand to look at all of him. You grab a <reading>bow</reading>ling (ぼう) ball and bowl all of his divided parts over!
